member.name: T:DataToSend.MessagePacket
member.summary: The data may be of any agreed-upon form. The Pack parameter to the structure gives the padding between fields. Here Pack = 1 is used because the original data was created in a 32-bit C++ DLL and no padding was used.

member.name: F:DataToSend.MessagePacket.messageTitle
member.summary: The string is included inline in the data.

member.name: F:DataToSend.MessagePacket.messageDescription
member.summary: Message description string with fixed length

member.name: P:DataToSend.MessagePacket.MessageTitle
member.summary: MessageTitle - string message title to send.

member.name: P:DataToSend.MessagePacket.MessageDescription
member.summary: MessageDescription - string message description that was sent.

member.name: P:DataToSend.MessagePacket.ErrorId
member.summary: Field for ErrorId if any. If all is ok - ErrorId = 0

member.name: P:DataToSend.MessagePacket.ModuleId
member.summary: ModuleId - Id of module from each answer is comming from

member.name: P:DataToSend.MessagePacket.ValueBefore
member.summary: Values befor that was present in the system

member.name: P:DataToSend.MessagePacket.ValueAfter
member.summary: Value after insertion that was inserted into system
